definitions.definition: The study of art or beauty.
That which appeals to the senses.
The artistic motifs defining a collection of things, especially works of art; more broadly, their vibe.
definitions.example: Her most recent works have this quirky, half-serious 90's teen culture-inspired aesthetic.

definitions.definition: Concerned with beauty, artistic impact, or appearance.
Beautiful or appealing to one's sense of beauty and/or art.
definitions.example: It works well enough, but the shabby exterior offends his aesthetic sensibilities.
